data.title: Theater mode gets auto-enabled on the home page in the new layout · Issue #866 · FrankerFaceZ/FrankerFaceZ
data.meta_description: Describe the bug To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior: Enable automatic theater mode Open a live stream Click the username to go to the home page Expected behavior Should just go to the home page. Instead goes to the home page, m...
